original_text: That day the Lord exalted Joshua in the sight of all Israel; and they stood in awe of him all the days of his life, just as they had stood in awe of Moses.
korean_text: 그 날에 여호와께서 모든 이스라엘의 목전에서 여호수아를 크게 하시매 그가 생존한 날 동안에 백성이 그를 두려워하기를 모세를 두려워하던 것 같이 하였더라

sentences.original_text: That day the Lord exalted Joshua
in the sight of all Israel
and they stood in awe of him
all the days of his life
just as they had stood in awe of Moses
